The mission of ServoTech Electronics is to support the manufacturing industry through high quality, low-cost services in the electronics repair field. Services such as repair, maintenance and upgrades are implemented by our experienced engineers at a competitive price.

We can design any electronic circuit you request. All we need to know is what you need it to do. If you have a need for electronic design services at a reasonable price contact us today. \n \nCall Us At: (519)342-6641.
